attributes.action: Resignation of  Dr Sally Davies Public Health England
attributes.additional_details:
Dr Sally Davies should be forced to resign as Chief Medical Officer for failures over handling of ebola,specifically: putting the lives of British public and those of other nations at risk by allowing health workers returning from working with ebola victims in Africa to travel on commercial flights and public transport;
not implementing 21 day quarantine rules; misinforming the public/media regarding methods of transmission.
